#summary How to start conference bot.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Introduction =

This page explains how you can run your own conference bot.

= Prereqs =

  # Create a new gtalk account and add all users that wish to participate to its buddy list.
  # Ask users to add gtalk account to their buddy list to start participating in the conference.
  # Get the latest build versions from [http://conf-bot.googlecode.com/files/dist-latest.zip here].
  # You will need J2SE 5 or above to run this application. Get the latest Java SE [http://java.com/en/download/ here]

= Details =

First Unzip the archive downloaded from [http://conf-bot.googlecode.com/files/dist-latest.zip here] and go to the dist folder.

{{{
cd dist
}}}

To run the project from the command line, type the following:

{{{
java -jar ConfBot.jar your-bot-account@gmail.com google-account-password choose-an-admin-password
}}}

To distribute this project, zip up the dist folder (including the lib folder)
and distribute the ZIP file.
